languages.text: "Улей разрушен, а по его улицам разгуливают ксеносы. Слишком много бед для одного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Звезда исчезла, а по Гордости Сантиэля разгуливают ксеносы. Слишком много бед для одной системы".

languages.text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."
languages.original_text: "Улей разрушен, а по его улицам разгуливают ксеносы. Слишком много бед для одного мира".

traits.locale_text: "First the star disappeared, and now there are xenos prowling Santiel's Pride. Too many coincidences for one system."
"First the star disappeared, and now there are xenos prowling Santiel's Pride. Too many coincidences for one system."
"The star vanished, and now there are xenos roaming Santiel's Pride. Too many misfortunes for one system."
"The star vanished, and now there are xenos roaming Santiel's Pride. Too many misfortunes for one system."
"The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

languages.text: “巢都已经毁了，街道上到处都是肆意横行的异形。这个世界遭受了太多的苦难。”
languages.original_text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

traits.locale_text: “巢都已经毁了，街道上到处都是肆意横行的异形。这个世界遭受了太多的苦难。”

languages.text: «La colmena está destruida y ahora hay xenos caminando por sus calles. Demasiadas desgracias para un solo mundo».
languages.original_text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

traits.locale_text: «La colmena está destruida y ahora hay xenos caminando por sus calles. Demasiadas desgracias para un solo mundo».

languages.text: 「このハイヴは破壊され、今では異種族がうろつく通り道だ。ひとつの星に不幸が重なりすぎだよ」
languages.original_text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

traits.locale_text: 「このハイヴは破壊され、今では異種族がうろつく通り道だ。ひとつの星に不幸が重なりすぎだよ」

languages.text: « La ruche est détruite et des xénos arpentent ses rues. Beaucoup trop de malheurs pour un seul monde... »
languages.original_text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

traits.locale_text: « La ruche est détruite et des xénos arpentent ses rues. Beaucoup trop de malheurs pour un seul monde... »

languages.text: "Die Makropole ist zerstört, und jetzt streifen Xenos auf ihren Straßen herum. Zu viel Unglück für eine Welt."
languages.original_text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

traits.locale_text: "Die Makropole ist zerstört, und jetzt streifen Xenos auf ihren Straßen herum. Zu viel Unglück für eine Welt."

languages.text: "Kovan yok oldu, zenolar etrafta fink atıyor. Bir dünya için bu kadar talihsizlik fazla."
languages.original_text: "The hive is destroyed, and now there are xenos roaming its streets. Too many misfortunes for one world."

traits.locale_text: "Kovan yok oldu, zenolar etrafta fink atıyor. Tek bir dünya için bu kadar talihsizlik fazla."
